transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ya, hi. Sir, main Ranjeet bol raha hun IndiaMART head office se, bol raha tha sir.
Customer: Hanji, hanji, hanji. Ranjeet ji.
Executive: Sir, kya haal hai Tai ji?
Customer: Badhiya sir.
Executive: Sir, actually mujhe ye janna tha, abhi sir aapke site pe na ek ticket
Customer: Hanji, hanji.
Executive: raise ki gayi hai video meeting ke liye. Tai ji, to to kya kuch problem hai to aajiye video meeting mein kar lete hai, aapka problem solve kar lete hai ki jo bhi aapka concern hai.
Customer: Aap mujhe naya link share kijiye.
Executive: Ek minute sir, whatsapp mein karu?
Customer: Haan, whatsapp mein.
Executive: Ek minute line pe rahiye sir.
Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Tai ji, sir, ye wali mail ID kiske paas hai? admin@dyno-solution.com
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Usi pe share kar dijiye aap.
Customer: Usi pe bhej dijiye, aap send kar dijiye usi pe hi.
Executive: Haan, maine send kar diya hai, aap ek baar check kijiye mail.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai, main karwata hun aur wahan se madam connect karengi.
Executive: Achha, madam connect karengi.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai, aap unko maine mail mein link share kar diya hai video meeting ki aur main aapko whatsapp bhi drop kar de raha hun Tai ji. Aap unko boliye join karne ke liye main idhar se join kar raha hun. Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requested a new video meeting link.

Resolution:

- Executive shared the video meeting link.

- Executive confirmed madam will connect from there.

Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, link sharing, ticket
